original: 3.3.3. Anāgatavāra🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānissati so sotāyatanaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: anāgatavāra  yaḥ cakkhāyatanam parijānissati saḥ sotāyatanam parijānissati iti āmantā
translated: … The future section🔽Will anyone who will fully understand the eye-sphere also fully understand the ear-sphere? …

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānissati so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānissati so cakkhu āyatanam parijānissati iti āmantā  yaḥ cakkhāyatanam na parijānissati saḥ sotāyatanam na parijānissati iti āmantā
translated: Or will anyone who will fully understand the ear-sphere also fully understand the eye-sphere? …🔽Will anyone who will not fully understand the eye-sphere also not fully understand the ear-sphere? …

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam na parijānissati so cakkhu āyatanam na parijānissati iti āmantā
translated: Or will anyone who will not fully understand the ear-sphere also not fully understand the eye-sphere? …
